title: Zac Brown, Joe Walsh Will Join ‘The Voice’ Season 28 as Mega Mentors
caption: 🎤🌟 Exciting news! @zacbrownband and @JoeWalshOfficial are bringing their talent to @NBCTheVoice as mega mentors for Season 28! 🙌 #TheVoice #MusicNews

title: Gracie Abrams’ Magical Red Rocks Shows Will Be Livestreamed on Apple Music
caption: ✨ Experience the magic of @gracieabrams at Red Rocks, no matter where you are! 🎶🌄 Livestream on Apple Music coming soon! 🎉 #GracieAbrams #RedRocksMagic

title: Echo & the Bunnymen Announce 2026 North American Greatest Hits Tour

title: Snoop Dogg Finally Scores His First Steal on ‘The Voice’
caption: 🎤 Snoop Dogg is bringing his signature style to #TheVoice! 🌟 Can't wait to see him in action! 🎶 #MusicNews
